TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyChangedEventManager extends System.Windows.WeakEventManager

summary.span: 提供 實作，讓您能夠使用「弱式事件接聽程式」模式附加 事件的接聽程式。

span.span: Provides a implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在此模式中的接聽程式，接聽程式物件必須實作。In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement . 您不需要實作是事件來源類別上。You do not need to implement on the class that is the source of the events.

summary.span: 加入指定的事件處理常式，當指定的來源引發指定之屬性的 事件時，就會呼叫這個處理常式。

span.span: Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the event for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法來指定您想要用來訂閱事件處理常式事件...Use this method to specify the event handler you want to use to subscribe to the event.. 當您使用這個方法時，接聽程式物件就不需要實作介面。When you use this method, your listener object does not need to implement the interface.

param.name: source
param.span: 要開始接聽 的物件。

span.span: The object on which to start listening for .

summary.span: 開始在提供的來源上接聽 事件。

span.span: Begins listening for the event on the provided source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這不會指定的屬性。事件管理員啟動之後，在來源上的所有屬性都會都有啟用的通知。This does not specify a property; once the event manager is started, all properties on the source will have notification enabled.
